successes.description: The Blue Bomber blasts his way into the board game world!

Pledges.description: Mega Man Supporter: Every level of funding helps us achieve the goal of getting this game into the hands of loyal Mega Man fans.  You'll receive access to backer avatars and Kickstarter updates.

Press Start:  Includes a Special Edition Proto Man game piece plus Kickstarter Exclusive Art Print.
Canada/Mexico add $15 for shipping. 
Bonus Stretch Goals are not included at this level.

Press Start Int'l:  Includes a Special Edition Proto Man game piece plus Kickstarter Exclusive Art Print. 
Bonus Stretch Goals are NOT included at this level.
Fee of $15 shipping added to all territories outside of the USA.

FIRST 24 HOURS EARLY BIRD! Level Up!: Includes one copy  of Mega Man The Board Game.
Canada/Mexico add $15 for shipping. 
Bonus Stretch Goals are not included at this level.
24 HOURS ONLY - EARLY BIRD! Level Up! Int'l: Includes one copy of Mega Man The Board Game.  Bonus Stretch Goals are NOT included at this level.
